Summary: the object appeared behind the houses in next neigborhood then slowly moved then dissappeared
divs: Sighting Detailsthe object moved from behind houses a light the size of a suv appeared orange then the light went small another light showed the outline of the craft as being the shape of a flat pyrmid then the light went off saw the shadow of the object then it suddeny dissappeared about a minute later to f18 foolowed its path then they also dissappeared at the timei was on my porch having a ciggarette time was just after nine pm my feeling were of what the hell is it. john l
trends: There has been one other sighting in Groveland
There were no other sightings in Groveland on or around January 19th 2012
